ItemConsumable.name: spider droid
ItemConsumable.description: A computer controlled laser gun mounted on a mobile spider bot. Once deployed it won't last very long. But can be useful when you need extra firepower on the run.
ItemConsumable.effectSpawn: You drop the spiderbot, and watch as it unfolds and lands on the ground, already skittering to and fro, its weapon looking for a target.
